casebody.data:
June 26, 1959.

No. —.

County School Board of Prince Edward County, Virginia, et al. v. Allen et al. Archibald G. Robertson, John W. Riely and T. Justin Moore, Jr. for petitioners. Albertis S. Harrison,.. Jr., Attorney General, and Henry T. Wickham, Special Assistant Attorney General, for the Commonwealth of Virginia.

The application for a stay of further proceedings in the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Virginia is denied.
